reports.name: Subscriptions Report per Creation Date, Product, Marketplace and Environment

parameters.name: Report period
parameters.description: Provide the subscriptions creation date period for the report

parameters.name: Product list
parameters.description: Select the products you want to include in the report

parameters.name: Parameter Id
parameters.description: Optionally add up to 2 subscription parameters id separated by | to be included in the report

parameters.name: Provider to Exclude Id
parameters.description: Optionally add one PA-###-### to be excluded from the report

parameters.name: Marketplaces
parameters.description: Select the marketplaces you want to include in the report

parameters.name: Type of Environment
parameters.description: Select the type of environment you want to include in report
